name: ChantBox
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chant box
des:
This skill is helpful to paly the chants on repeat or for long hours. 
There are multiple deity chants or Moola mantras available to choose from.
Just say : Alexa, Open Chant Box
Just Say: Play {Deity} => 
Deities available to play & language
Ganapathi (Sanskrit),
Siva (Sanskrit),
Venkatesa (Sanskrit),
Narayana (Telugu)
Sri Maatre (Sanskrit),
Surya (Sanskrit),
Divakara (Sanskrit),
Sai (Telugu),
Mruthyunjaya (Sanskrit),
Om (Sanskrit),
Swasthi Vachanam (Sanskrit),
Vasudeva (Sanskrit),
Hare Krishna (Hindi),
Arunachala (Telugu)
This content is available in Sanskrit, Hindi, Telugu based on the chant you wanted to be played.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
